tasks.title: Initialize monorepo project structure
tasks.description:
Set up the monorepo structure with backend/ and frontend/ directories.

**Backend Setup:**
- Create backend/ directory
- Initialize Node.js + Express project with package.json
- Include express, cors, and other essential dependencies
- Create basic server structure (src/index.js or similar)

**Frontend Setup:**
- Create frontend/ directory
- Initialize React + Vite project with package.json
- Include react, react-dom, vite dependencies
- Set up basic Vite configuration

**Root Files:**
- Create root README.md with setup instructions for both backend and frontend
- Include commands to install dependencies and run both projects
- Document the monorepo structure

**Gitignore:**
- Create .gitignore at root level
- Exclude node_modules, dist, *.db
- Include common IDE and OS files
acceptance_criteria: backend/ directory exists with valid package.json
frontend/ directory exists with valid package.json
Both projects can install dependencies successfully

tasks.title: Validate project structure setup
tasks.description:
Verify that the monorepo structure has been set up correctly.

**Validation Steps:**
1. Check that backend/package.json exists and is valid JSON
2. Check that frontend/package.json exists and is valid JSON
3. Verify README.md exists at root and contains setup instructions
4. Verify .gitignore exists and includes node_modules, dist, *.db
5. Attempt to run npm install in both backend/ and frontend/ directories
6. Verify no errors occur during installation

**Success Criteria:**
All files exist in correct locations, package.json files are valid, and dependencies install without errors.
acceptance_criteria: package.json files are valid and parseable
Dependencies install without errors in both projects
